question: 新しい
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>new</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>new</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: 

Your family buys you a <vocabulary>new</vocabulary> Atari! You're so excited! But wait... what's this? This is no Atari. This is an <reading>Atara</reading>... a knockoff video game system :(
